applications.name: Find and Replace
applications.description: A simple find and replace method, written with TypeScript, Sass and Pug. Capable of finding multiple occurrences and replacing all of them.

applications.description: A simple percentage calculator method, written with TypeScript, Sass and Pug.

applications.name: Unscrabbler
applications.description: An Unscrabble game, can you beat Unscrabbler?. Written with TypeScript, Sass and Pug.

applications.name: Random Generator
applications.description: A simple random generator. Generating a random string of A-B, 0-9 and a given length. Written with TypeScript, Sass and Pug.

applications.name: Dictionary Word Finder
applications.description: A simple dictionary word lookup tool. Written with TypeScript, Sass and Pug.

applications.name: Knockout + TypeScript
applications.description: An example of KnockoutJS being enhanced by TypeScript. Written with KnockoutJS, TypeScript, Sass and Pug.

applications.name: A-Frame VR Cubik Game
applications.subHeading: Focus on the initial spinning cube to start the game.
applications.description: An example VR application. Using A-Frame, TypeScript, Sass and Pug.
